alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:04PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Churchill, north central Mineral and south central Pershing Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 104 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 33 miles southeast of Lovelock to 24 miles southwest of Middlegate. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlegate, Stillwater, Junction U.S 50 And Nv 121 (Dixie Valley Rd), Junction U.S 50 And NV 839, Silver Hill, Rawhide, Frenchman, Fairview Peak, Sand Mountain, Nv 361 At Mineral-Churchill Co Line, Lone Rock, Healy Peak, Dixie Valley, Sand Mountain Campground, Mount Lincoln, Junction U.S 50 And NV 722 and Mount Augusta. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
